entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
